citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the facility could not provide disposition records for 1 degu, 3 sugar gliders, and 10 lovebirds.
Failure to maintain these records can make it difficult to track animals being used in regulated activities to ensure their
humane care and use.
The facility must maintain records containing the required information for animals which fully and correctly disclose the
number of animals held, owned, and acquired or disposed of including births and deaths. Correct by May 13, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
TONYA HADJIS n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
At the time of inspection, the facility could not provide disposition records for 1 degu, 3 sugar gliders, and 10 lovebirds. 
Failure to maintain these records can make it difficult to track animals being used in regulated activities to ensure their 
humane care and use. 
 
The facility must maintain records containing the required information for animals which fully and correctly disclose the 
number of animals held, owned, and acquired or disposed of including births and deaths. Correct by May 13, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
TONYA HADJIS n
